stanza.line: From you have I been absent in the springspring
When proud-pied April (dressed in all his trim)trim)
Hath put a spirit of youth in every thingthing
That heavy Saturn laughed and leaped with himhim
Yet nor the lays of birds nor the sweet smellsmell
Of different flowers in odour and in huehue
Could make me any summer story telltell
Or from their proud lap pluck them where they grewgrew
Nor did I wonder at the lily whitewhite
Nor praise the deep vermilion in the roserose
They were but sweet but figures of delightdelight
Drawn after you you pattern of all thosethose
Yet seemed it winter still and you awayaway
As with your shadow I with these did playplay
